items.title: jQuery and HTML5 Data Visualization Demos | Kendo UI DataViz widgets
items.meta: Find demos for Kendo UI jQuery data visualization widgets, included in Kendo UI DataViz. Learn how to create sleek business apps with HTML5 charts, Kendo UI Gauge widgets, etc.

items.title: Kendo UI jQuery-based Area Charts Demo
items.meta: This demo illustrates how Kendo UI Area Charts component can be added to your web page in order to visualize quantitive data. Learn how to define your area chart.

items.title: Kendo UI jQuery stacked area chart example
items.meta: This demo shows how the stacked area is created with KendoChart. Learn how to visualize series that should be stacked in the chart.

items.title: Date axis sample for Kendo UI Area Charts
items.meta: This demo shows how you can set specific base date units in your Kendo UI Area Chart to help you visualize a seasonal trend in your app.

items.title: Multi-axis demo for Kendo UI Area Charts component
items.meta: Ensure the best performance of HTML5 charting and visualize data on multiple axis with Kendo UI Area Charts  in order to provide solid business reports for end users.

items.title: Example of jQuery & HTML5 Kendo UI Area Chart bound to remote data
items.meta: This demo shows how Kendo UI Area Chart can be bound to remote data by configuring the DataSource transport which defines how the DataSource interacts with remote data.

items.title: Kendo UI Area Charts binding to local data example
items.meta: This sample demonstrates that Kendo UI HTML5 chart can use existing objects as data points.

items.title: Kendo UI Bar Chart widget demo
items.meta: This example illustrates the basic usage of Kendo UI Bar Chart which enables the user to show customized bar charts.

items.title: Example of a basic Kendo UI Column Chart control
items.meta: This demo shows how some settings of Kendo UI chart widget can be changed in order to display the bar Chart as a Column chart.

items.title: Kendo UI jQuery-powered Stacked Bar Charts | Kendo UI DataViz Demos
items.meta: This example shows how Kendo UI Bar Charts component supports a stacked bar. The feature of the widget is enabled by setting the stacked property to true.

items.title: Kendo UI Stacked and Grouped Bar Chart Example
items.meta: This sample demonstrates the implementation of Kendo UI stacked and grouped bars in various data visualization-driven web apps.

items.title: Date axis example in Kendo UI jQuery chart control
items.meta: This sample shows how you can configure the base date unit for your date axis in Kendo UI HTML5 business bar chart.

items.title: Example of multiple axes implementation in Kendo UI Bar Chart
items.meta: This sample illustrates how you can display a data series, using multiple axes in your business chart, built with Kendo UI HTML5 Bar Chart widget.

items.title: Binding to remote data demo | Kendo UI HTML5 jQuery Bar Charts
items.meta: This demo shows how Kendo UI Bar Charts widget can be bound to remote data to produce high-performance report in your business app.

items.title: Local data-binding example | Kendo UI Bar Charts
items.meta: This demo shows how the local data-binding is supported in Kendo UI Bar Charts. Use the demo source code to try the feature of the widget.

items.title: Grouped data binding demo for Kendo UI HTML5 Bar Charts
items.meta: This example shows the feature of binding to grouped data in Kendo UI Bar Charts. See the source code to find how to use name templates for the data group.

items.title: Kendo UI Bubble Charts demo
items.meta: This example demonstrates the basic usage and core features of Kendo UI jQuery & HTML5 Bubble Charts widget.

items.title: Binding to remote data example | Kendo UI Bubble Chart demo
items.meta: This demo illustrates binding to remote data feature of Kendo UI Bubble Chart for rich HTML5 visualizations.

items.title: Local data binding mode in Kendo UI Bubble chart widget
items.meta: This demo illustrates the powerful "Binding to local data" feature, supported in Kendo UI Bubble Chart widget.

items.title: Binding to grouped data example | Kendo UI HTML5 Bubble Charts
items.meta: This demo shows how to bind Kendo UI Bubble Charts component to grouped data. See how you can implement the feature in your rich web app.

items.title: Kendo UI Line Charts Demo
items.meta: This example illustrates the features and core functionality of Kendo UI Line Charts component. HTML5 line graphs show trends over a specific time period.

items.title: Kendo UI Stacked Line Charts Demo
items.meta: This demo shows how you can easily implement Kendo UI Stacked Line Charts in your business webapp.

items.title: Example of Kendo UI HTML5 Line Charts Date Axis
items.meta: This demo illustrates the date axis in Kendo UI Line Charts can be easily changed by setting the configuration and specifying the aggregate function value.

items.title: Multi-axes feature example | Kendo UI Line Charts widget
items.meta: This demo shows how easily Kendo UI Line Charts can be customized to achieve what you want in your app. Apply multiple axes to your Kendo UI Line Charts.

items.title: Binding to remote data example | Kendo UI Line Charts features
items.meta: This example illustrates how binding to remote data works in Kendo UI Line Charts and the demo source code would guide you how to apply it to your line chart.

items.title: Binding to local data example | Kendo UI Line Charts
items.meta: This example illustrates how Kendo UI Line Charts use existing objects as data points.

items.title: Binding to grouped data demo | Kendo UI Line Charts
items.meta: This example illustrates how binding to grouped data feature works in Kendo UI Line Charts.

items.title: Kendo UI Donut Charts Example
items.meta: This demo shows the core functionality of Kendo UI jQuery Donut Charts which visualize the breakdown of data into its elements.

items.title: Donut labels demo | Kendo UI Donut Charts
items.meta: This example shows how to configure the values of Kendo UI jQuery Donut Charts, enable/disable donut labels and specify how they are aligned to the chart.

items.title: Binding to remote data demo for Kendo UI Donut Charts
items.meta: This example shows how to bind Kendo UI Donut Charts to remote data.

items.title: Kendo UI Donut Charts binding to local data example
items.meta: This demo illustrates how Kendo UI Donut Charts widget can be bound to local data to deliver high-performance business application.

items.title: Kendo UI HTML5 Pie Charts Example
items.meta: This demo shows how Kendo UI Pie Charts is easily applied to web apps. The control draws data series in slices in order to create rich HTML5 visualizations.

items.title: Pie labels demo | Kendo UI jQuery Pie Charts
items.meta: This demo shows how the animated pie labels work in Kendo UI Pie Charts and lets you play with the configuration of the labels.

items.title: Binding to remote data example | Kendo UI Pie Charts
items.meta: This demo illustrates how Kendo UI Pie Charts can be bound to remote data by configuring Kendo UI DataSource component.

items.title: Kendo UI jQuery Pie Charts binding to local data demo
items.meta: This demo shows how Kendo UI Pie Charts use existing objects as data points. The example illustrates binding to local data feature of the widget.

items.title: Kendo UI jQuery-powered Scatter Charts Demo
items.meta: This example shows the most important features and functionality of Kendo UI Scatter Charts.

items.title: Kendo UI Scatter Line Charts Demo
items.meta: This sample demonstrates how Kendo UI Scatter Line Charts combines Line and Scatter chart types in your rich HTML5 data visualizations.

items.title: Date Axis demo in Kendo UI Scatter Charts
items.meta: This example illustrates all properties, specific to date value axis of Kendo UI jQuery Scatter Charts.

items.title: Multiple axes in Kendo UI HTML5 Scatter Charts | Kendo UI DataViz Demos
items.meta: This demo illustrates how array of values for multi-axis Kendo UI Scatter Charts are displayed on the plot area.

items.title: Remote data-bound scatter series example | Kendo UI Scatter Charts
items.meta: This demo shows how scatter series of Kendo UI Scatter Charts can be bound to remote data source items.

items.title: Example of binding to local data in Kendo UI jQuery Scatter Charts
items.meta: This demo shows how Kendo UI Scatter Charts can use local objects as data points in the HTML5 visualization.

items.title: Example of Kendo UI Scatter Charts bound to grouped data
items.meta: This demo shows how define a group of values in Kendo UI Scatter Charts by configuring the parameters in the DataSource component.

items.title: Kendo UI jQuery Plotting - Kendo UI jQuery Plot Bands Example
items.meta: This sample demonstrates how to add plot bands to your Kendo UI jQuery charts in order to plot data within some borders.

items.title: Kendo UI Charts API methods
items.meta: This demo shows how the API manipulates the methods, applicable to Kendo UI jQuery-based chart components.

items.title: Events API for Kendo UI HTML5 charting components | Kendo UI DataViz Demos
items.meta: This sample demonstrates the events which are specific to Kendo UI HTML5 chart components.

items.title: Kendo UI Radial Gauge Demo
items.meta: This sample demonstrates the core functionality of Kendo UI Radial Gauge which helps you easily visualize an indicator within a range of values.

items.title: Kendo UI Radial Gauge scale customization demo
items.meta: This example shows how you can easily use simple options to configure the gauge, enable/disable scale ranges and gauge labels.

items.title: Kendo UI jQuery-powered Linear Gauge Example
items.meta: This example shows how you can easily implement Kendo UI Linear Gauge in your HTML5 web application. Draw end users attention to a certain range of values.

items.title: Scale customization example for Kendo UI Linear Gauge
items.meta: This sample illustrates how you can customize Kendo UI Linear Gauge by changing the location of the gauge scale and its appearance.

items.title: Kendo UI Chart controls application sample | Stock History
items.meta: The Stock History Dashboard demonstrates how the charting components in Kendo UI DataViz HTML5 framework are used to build a complex finance application.

items.title: Sample car dashboard, built with Kendo UI DataViz components
items.meta: This sample demonstrates the use of Kendo UI jQuery Gauges in the Car Dashboard app.
